creditline: Gift of Aref J. and Barbara A. Jabr
description: tapered octagonal body; long, thin spout; body decorated with sailboats, ruins, palm trees and figure with camel; cover decorated at corners with palm trees, camel, building and boat
inscription:
Inscription

in design to L of handle, in black: untranslated inscription
object_name: Coffee pot, from a five-piece set
text: This coffee and tea set features etched scenes palm trees and camels along with Iraqi tourist destinations such as the Ctesiphon Arch and the swamps of the Marsh Arabs and their reed houses in the south.  This type of silverwork is a traditional craft in Iraq and the set would have been made to appeal to the tourist trade.
title: Coffee pot, from a five-piece set
